briefdescription.para: Prints dimensions, number of nonzero elements, data, column pointers and row indices for a sparse matrix in CSC form.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to QOCOCscMatrix that will be printed.

briefdescription.para: Checks stopping criteria. Before calling this function, work->kkt->rhs must contain the residual of the KKT conditions as computed by compute_kkt_residual().

simplesect.para: 1 if stopping criteria met and 0 otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Copies data to QOCOSolution struct when solver terminates.
Allocates and returns a copy of the input settings struct.

simplesect.para: Pointer to constructed and copies settings struct.
